com.paypal.selion.utils

Class AuthenticationHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.paypal.selion.utils.AuthenticationHelper

  • public final class AuthenticationHelper
extends Object
    A Helper class that helps do an authentication check for the given user name password. NOTE: This class DOES NOT validate the credentials against LDAP. The following are some of the assumptions that this helper makes.
    • User name will always be admin and CANNOT be changed.
    • Multiple user names are not supported.
